title: Great Ocean Road Apartment Stay Near Tower Hill Wildlife Reserve
description: Make Harmony at Tower Hill your home during a Great Ocean Road trip in Victoria. Tick off iconic sights such as the Twelve Apostles, Port Campbell National Park and more while staying just a short drive from Port Fairy and Warrnambool. Enjoy the comfort of a self-contained apartment, plus fantastic inclusions such as breakfast hamper for two, a bottle of wine on arrival and discounts at local attractions and restaurants.
offer_address: Princes Hwy & Lake View Road, Tower Hill VIC 3283
